title: A snare is a poor man's stun

replies.body: No, but that is hardly a revelation. Champions are given snares because giving them a stun would be too overbearing.
A snare is a poor man's root.
Yes, except most of the times snares last longer than stuns, with a few exceptions (gold card).
More or less everything is a poor man's stun with the exception of suppress. Suppress is the richest daddy.
